item.title: Build a datalake on top of BigQuery
item.description: Google BigQuery is a very powerful, serverless data warehosue that lets you ingest unlimited data on a pay-per-use basis (storage + querying). The primary advantage of data warehouses is the ability to quickly query and analyze immense amounts of structured data. Modern data warehouses support new, unstructured data types such as JSON, Avro, and so on, which makes these data warehouses a great contender for data lakes. BigQuery recently added native JSON column type, which we can leverage for our semi-structured lakehouse.
